meaning_str.bing:
n. 尊重；尊敬；敬意；重视
v. 尊重；尊敬；遵守；仰慕
网络. 方面；敬重；敬爱

尊重；尊敬；敬重；敬慕；敬佩；注重；重视；关注；考虑；（事物的）方面；细节；特点；问候；礼貌；关切；维护；关系；关联；着眼点
尊重；尊敬；敬重；注重；重视；关注；遵守（法律、规则）；遵从；避免损害；不损害；维护；顾及；仰慕；慎重对待；谨慎从事；考虑到；留心；关于；涉及
真了不起（因敬重或赞同而发出的感叹）

1.en: She said as a guest of a banquet, it was important for you to feel comfortable, be considerate and respect the host.
1.cn: 她指出，如果以受邀者的身份参加宴会，最重要的是要感到舒服、顾及其他人的感受，和尊重邀请人。

2.en: He has worked his way up in his present company to a position of responsibility and respect.
2.cn: 这让他在他的公司获得了如今的地位，并且得到了大家认可和尊重。

3.en: I got through memorable college time, known a lot of close schoolmates, I grown up in every respect in the four years of college time.
3.cn: 我度过了难忘的大学时光，结识了一群要好的同学，四年的时光是自己在各方面都成熟了许多。

0.en: And one day, this city is gonna respect us.
0.cn: 总有一天，我们会赢得这座城市的尊重。

1.en: They respect you more when you show strength.
1.cn: 你强势，他们反而更尊重你。

2.en: Han, shh. These people are in mourning. Show some respect.
2.cn: Han，小声点，这些人在哀悼呢，放尊重点。

3.en: Respect our tradition, warchief. You know the penalty. Death.
3.cn: 尊重我们的传统，大酋长，你懂这个规矩，杀无赦。

4.en: Respect? You wanted my respect? Yeah. Yeah, okay. No, you wanted to show me up, Randall.
4.cn: 尊重？你想要我尊重你？对。不，你只想在我面前炫耀，兰德尔。

5.en: I can't pry. I mean, I have to respect his wishes.
5.cn: 我也不能窥探他隐私，我得尊重他的意愿。

6.en: Me? Me show some respect? What will you two do next?
6.cn: 我? 我要尊重他? 你们俩接下来想怎么着。

7.en: So you show a little respect. When someone offers you a job.
7.cn: 所以当别人给你工作时，得有起码的尊重。

8.en: Your respect for Chinese ways and culture is known to us, Prince.
8.cn: 我们了解您对中原文化和习俗的尊重，王子。

9.en: If we don't respect the past, you'll find it's hard to build our future.
9.cn: 如果我们不尊重过去，就更不能创造未来。

10.en: That's when I lost my respect for her. Yes, I can understand that.
10.cn: 那一刻她失去了我对她的尊重。是的，我能理解。

11.en: We haven't had a discussion on that yet. We came to you first, out of respect.
11.cn: 还没讨论过，我们出于尊重，先来找您。

12.en: We're at the hotel. It's a free zone. Still. Out of respect.
12.cn: 我们这是在酒店，自由场所。还是注意点吧，出于尊重。

13.en: I made this herd, so you need to start treating me with some respect.
13.cn: 没有我哪有今天的我们 你们最好给我放尊重一点。

14.en: No, I respect your feedback. Thank you for being so professional about everything.
14.cn: 不，我尊重你的反馈，感谢你能表现得如此专业。

15.en: Do something. What the hell? What are you doing here? I am trying to respect Amy.
15.cn: 帮帮忙。什么鬼？你在我们家干嘛？我在试着尊重艾米。

16.en: We've worked hard for it. If you respect this place, you and I will get along just fine.
16.cn: 大家都很努力，尊重这个地方，我们就能成为朋友。

17.en: Yeah. Well, you can still tell Queller the truth. I think she'll respect your honesty.
17.cn: 你还是可以跟库娜说真相啊，我想她会尊重你的诚实的。

18.en: You have to respect your own mortality, Doug. I don't want to be standing over your grave.
18.cn: 你得尊重自己终有一死的命运，道格，我不想给你收尸。

19.en: Show some respect. Honey, please. No. This is what we wanted. What we've worked for.
19.cn: 放尊重点。亲爱的，行了。不，这是我们要的，我们奋斗的目标。
